text:
Nobody can access that link without have access to that poral.

forms/v2 can not be defered.

The splide one depends on how its being loaded, either from module or not. Both are in HubSpot's docs
how to defer a module's js is here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/configuration>
or here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#require-js>
